AI Description: iperf3 is a tool for actively measuring the maximum achievable bandwidth on IP networks. It supports various parameters to customize the testing process and is widely used for network performance testing and tuning.
Core Features:
1. Measures TCP, UDP, and SCTP bandwidth performance
2. Supports IPv4 and IPv6
3. Option for bidirectional testing
4. Customizable testing parameters
5. Supports client-server architecture
6. Real-time measurements and statistics
